dublin_core.dcvalue: Electromagnetic interference EMI to critical care medical devices has been reported by various groups Previuos study demonstrated that infusion pumps are susceptible of false alarm buzzing and block of infusion when exposed to various EMI sources Aim of this paper is to investigate the changes in the risk of EMI from the estimates of our previous 2005 survey and to extend the EMI risk assessment to newer telecommunication products DECT phones and WiFi terminals With regards to GSM phones compare to the results obtained in 2005 we observed a decrease in the rate of failure from 58 to 30 From our findings the use of WiFi and DECT does not pose a real risk to infusion systems
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Electromagnetic interference to infusion pumps. Update2008 from GSM mobile phones.
